p: This study demonstrated that neither of the two employed image analysis tools displayed perfect performance after comparing their result at the cell level with the reference standard. However, the ML-based analysis with Aiforia exhibited better agreement with the reference standard in both cell detection and Ki67 score calculation compared to the non-ML-based analysis with ImageScope. Furthermore, it was demonstrated that the improved concordance between the Aiforia’s Ki67 score, and the reference standard was attributed to its ability to distinguish between tumor and non-tumor cells.
